entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
